New Records: Kohli scored 82 not out, equalling his highest score in the tournament
Key Match Events: India won the match by 4 wickets with 0 balls to spare
Kohli and Pandya's partnership was crucial in the chase
Multiple twists and turns in the last few overs
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and decided to bowl first
Pakistan's bowlers initially had India in trouble
Key player matchups were highlighted, especially Kohli and Babar Azam
Post-Match Reflections: Kohli praised the team's resilience and Hardik Pandya's role
Babar Azam acknowledged the performance of Indian bowlers and Kohli's innings
The match was a pivotal moment in the tournament for both teams
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in front of over 90,000 fans at the MCG
The game was a thrilling and memorable contest
